contents_3.subject: How do we manage investment?

sub_contents.investment company: We invest in companies developing real estate, especially in residential properties where the securities provided are safe and sound. We carefully select the companies we invest through our extensive research and analysis of the companies’ performance, credibility, and potential to grow.
